Name: Commander Pixel
Description: Once a decorated officer in the Bit Battalion, Commander Pixel now serves as a strategic advisor in the WebtrES club. Known for his stoic red and black screen which glows like the embers of a digital fire, he remains a symbol of strength and discipline. His classic button configuration and traditional arms and legs are a testament to his old-school approach to problem-solving, often leading to innovative yet practical solutions. Despite his soldier-like demeanor, he's respected for his unwavering loyalty and his ability to lead WebtrES club members through the most complex of cyber challenges.
